record.title: MOTION TO ADJOURN

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: PRICE
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.

record.chair: The question is on the motion to adjourn.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: PRICE
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.
record.chair: Pursuant to clause 8 of rule XX, this 15-minute vote on the motion to adjourn will be followed by a 5-minute vote on agreeing to the Speaker's approval of the Journal.
